information: The company FERINOX, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1996, which operates in the Boilers, light-alloy industry. It also operates in the Iron, special grade and pig iron, Industrial sheet metal work, Metal working, and boilerwork mechanized welding industries. It is based in St Herblon, France.
